scripts.watch:app: NODE_PATH=./src/ watchify ./src/app/app.js -o dist/app.js --extension=.jsx --standalone MTME -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -v
scripts.build:app: NODE_PATH=./src/ browserify ./src/app/app.js -o dist/app.js --extension=.jsx --standalone MTME -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build: npm run copy-files:mdi && npm run copy-files:static && npm run build:app
scripts.copy-files:static: mkdir dist || true && cp -R src/static/* dist/
scripts.copy-files:mdi: mkdir -p dist/css || true && cp ./node_modules/mdi/css/materialdesignicons.min.css* dist/css/ && mkdir -p dist/fonts || true && cp ./node_modules/mdi/fonts/* dist/fonts/
